Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and satisfaction. Given its quality and the benefits it offers, we believe it's worth more than its face value of $150. Considering its unique features and the time we've invested in developing it, I'm proposing an offer of $200 for this product. This price reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the opportunity for you to experience something truly special. I trust you'll find it worth every penny. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
